item.title: 州长宣布德克萨斯州能源基金为 122 兆瓦天然气设施提供首笔贷款
item.description: 德克萨斯州州长格雷格-阿博特（Greg Abbott）周四宣布，第一份德克萨斯能源基金（TEF）贷款协议将用于资助德克萨斯州一座 122 兆瓦（MW）的天然气发电厂。【原文：Texas Governor Greg Abbott announced on Thursday that the first Texas Energy Fund (TEF) loan agreement will be used to fund a 122 megawatt (MW) natural gas power plant in Texas.】

item.title: 巴尔：美联储完全有能力静观关税走势
item.description: 美联储理事迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）周四在讲话中表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税可能会增加通胀，也可能会推高失业率。【原文：President Donald Trump's tariffs will likely increase inflation and could also drive up unemployment, Federal Reserve Governor Michael Barr said on Thursday in remarks that signaled that he - like most of his Fed colleagues - wants to wait for more clarity before making any interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 锂产业哀叹低价与需求增长的 "悖论
item.description: 全球最大的锂生产商在本周举行的一次重要行业会议上表示，尽管对这种电池金属的需求持续攀升，但锂价却持续下滑，这是一个令人沮丧的 "悖论"，至少在2030年之前不可能得到解决。【原文：An ongoing slide in lithium prices even as demand for the battery metal continues to climb is a frustrating "paradox" not likely to be resolved before at least 2030, the world's largest producers told a major industry conference this week.】

item.title: 在 "星链 "申请许可证之际，马斯克致电黎巴嫩总统
item.description: 奥恩办公室周四发表声明说，亿万富翁、商人埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与黎巴嫩总统约瑟夫-奥恩（Joseph Aoun）通了电话，讨论了在黎巴嫩提供马斯克庞大商业帝国的要素的问题。【原文：Billionaire businessman Elon Musk and Lebanese President Joseph Aoun spoke by phone to discuss making elements of Musk's sprawling business empire available in Lebanon, a statement from Aoun's office said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，CoreWeave 正在洽谈收购 Core Scientific
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，CoreWeave公司正在洽谈收购Core Scientific公司，这家比特币矿商去年拒绝了这家云服务提供商早些时候提出的交易。【原文：CoreWeave is in talks to buy Core Scientific , after the bitcoin miner rejected an earlier deal from the cloud provider last year, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Equinix 的营收和资本支出预期令投资者失望，股价下跌
item.description: Equinix 的股价周四下跌了 8%，此前这家数据中心公司预测收入增长低于预期，并预计将进行大量投资以满足人工智能的长期需求。【原文：Equinix's shares fell 8% on Thursday after the data center firm forecast revenue growth below expectations and projected heavy investments to cater to AI demand in the long term.】

item.title: 西门子歌美飒首席运营官称，西门子歌美飒与中国磁铁供应商讨论在欧洲生产事宜
item.description: 风力涡轮机制造商西门子-歌美飒（Siemens Gamesa）正在与中国稀土永磁供应商洽谈将生产基地迁往欧洲的可能性，以减少该地区在中国限制供应后对进口的依赖。【原文：Wind turbine maker Siemens Gamesa is in talks with Chinese suppliers of rare earth permanent magnets about the possibility of bringing production to Europe, in a bid to cut the region's reliance on imports after curbs on supplies from China.】

item.title: 西门子能源公司目标于 2027 年在美国生产变压器，并进一步扩大工厂规模
item.description: 西门子能源集团的高级管理人员表示，该集团预计将于 2027 年开始在美国生产大型工业电力变压器，如果需求和进口关税居高不下，该集团还将进一步扩建夏洛特工厂。【原文：Siemens Energy is expecting to start U.S. production of big industrial power transformers in 2027 and can further expand its Charlotte factory if demand, and import tariffs, stay high, senior executives at the group said.】

item.title: 独家报道亚马逊失去 AWS 生成式 AI 老大，技术人才洗牌白热化
item.description: 随着人才竞争的白热化，亚马逊的 AWS 最近失去了主管生成式人工智能开发的副总裁。【原文：Amazon's AWS recently lost its vice president overseeing generative artificial intelligence development, as the competition for talent heats up.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行前首席执行官斯塔利必须面对美国股东就杰弗里-爱泼斯坦关系提起的诉讼
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）和前首席执行官杰斯-斯塔利（Jes Staley）必须面对洛杉矶的一项诉讼，该诉讼声称他们欺骗了股东，因为斯塔利与已故金融家杰弗里-爱泼斯坦（Jeffrey Epstein）关系密切。【原文：Barclays and former Chief Executive Jes Staley must face a lawsuit in Los Angeles claiming they defrauded shareholders about Staley's close ties to the disgraced late financier Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会、瑞波公司希望就加密货币诉讼达成和解，但遭到美国法官拒绝
item.description: 周四，一名联邦法官驳回了瑞波实验室（Ripple Labs）和美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）提出的一项不同寻常的联合动议，即批准该加密货币公司减免 5000 万美元罚款，以了结因销售未注册证券而引发的民事诉讼。【原文：A federal judge on Thursday rejected an unusual joint motion by Ripple Labs and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to endorse the cryptocurrency company's reduced $50 million fine to settle a civil lawsuit over the sale of unregistered securities.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特斯拉高管、埃隆-马斯克的亲信离开电动汽车制造商
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉高管、首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的心腹奥米德-阿什法尔（Omead Ashfar）已离开公司。【原文：Tesla executive and a confidant of CEO Elon Musk, Omead Ashfar, has left the company, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Dinari 获得首家经纪商注册资格，可提供代币化股票
item.description: Dinari 是一家提供基于区块链的美股的初创公司，其子公司已获得经纪商注册，该公司称此举使其成为美国首个获得此类批准的代币化股票平台。【原文：Dinari, a startup that offers blockchain-based U.S. stocks, has secured a broker-dealer registration for its subsidiary, a move the company says makes it the first tokenized equity platform to secure such approval in the U.S.】

item.title: 诺和诺德与 WeightWatchers 合作销售 Wegovy
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）周四表示，它将与WeightWatchers合作，从7月1日开始销售其减肥特效药Wegovy。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Thursday it will collaborate with WeightWatchers to sell its blockbuster weight-loss drug, Wegovy, starting July 1.】

item.title: 古尔斯比告诉CNBC，"影子 "美联储主席不会影响政策辩论
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普任命美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）继任者的任何举动，在被提名人等待确认期间都不会对货币政策产生影响。【原文：Any move by U.S. President Donald Trump to name a replacement for Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell would have no influence on monetary policy while the nominee awaited confirmation, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said on Thursday.】

item.title: 收债公司 Jefferson Capital 在纳斯达克首秀表现强劲，估值达 12 亿美元
item.description: Jefferson Capital 周四在纳斯达克首次上市时股价上涨了 26.7%，这家消费者债务催收公司的估值为 12 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Jefferson Capital rose 26.7% in their Nasdaq debut on Thursday, valuing the consumer debt collector at $1.2 billion.】

item.title: 壳牌和 Equinor 将其英国合资企业命名为 Adura
item.description: 壳牌和 Equinor 周四表示，壳牌和 Equinor 在英国的合资企业将成为英国北海最大的石油和天然气生产商，并将命名为 Adura。【原文：Shell's and Equinor's British joint venture, set to become the biggest oil and gas producer in the UK North Sea, will be named Adura, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据《The Information》报道，DeepSeek R2 发布受阻，首席执行官对进展讳莫如深
item.description: 据《The Information》周四援引两位知情人士的话报道，中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 尚未确定其 R2 模型的发布时间，因为公司首席执行官梁文峰对其性能并不满意。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek has not yet determined the timing of the release of its R2 model as CEO Liang Wenfeng is not satisfied with its performance, The Information reported on Thursday, citing two people with knowledge of the situation.】

item.title: 机械师向劳工委员会申请成立西弗吉尼亚州普惠公司工会
item.description: 北美最大的航空航天工会已向全国劳工关系委员会提交申请，要求代表西弗吉尼亚州普惠公司发动机维修车间的工人。【原文：North America's largest aerospace union has filed a petition with the National Labor Relations Board to represent workers at a Pratt & Whitney engine repair shop in West Virginia, as organizers try to make inroads across southern U.S. states and elsewhere where aerospace companies are growing production.】

item.title: 贝莱德寻求将私人市场扩展至退休计划
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周一表示，随着公司向另类投资领域拓展，将把私人资产纳入其退休计划。【原文：BlackRock is set to include private assets in its retirement plans as it expands into alternative investments, the world's largest asset manager said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国 5 月成屋销售增幅高于预期
item.description: 5 月份，美国旧房购买合同的增幅超过预期，但较高的抵押贷款利率仍然制约着购房者。【原文：Contracts to buy previously owned U.S. homes increased more than expected in May, but higher mortgage rates remain a constraint for buyers.】

item.title: 全球金融犯罪监察机构呼吁采取行动应对加密货币风险
item.description: 全球金融犯罪监管机构金融行动特别工作组（FATF）周四呼吁各国采取更有力的行动打击加密资产非法融资，并警告称监管漏洞可能会产生全球性影响。【原文：The Financial Action Task Force (FATF), a global financial crime watchdog, on Thursday called on countries to take stronger action to combat illicit finance in crypto assets, warning that gaps in regulation could have global repercussions.】

item.title: 美国参议院共和党人竞相解决特朗普税改法案中的税收和医疗问题
item.description: 美国国会共和党人周四争先恐后地解决其全面减税和支出法案中棘手的税收和医疗保健条款，因为总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）催促他们在7月4日截止日期前通过该法案。【原文：Republicans in the U.S. Congress scrambled on Thursday to resolve nettlesome tax and health care provisions in their sweeping tax-cut and spending bill on Thursday as President Donald Trump pressed them to pass it by a July 4 deadline.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利：美联储放宽杠杆率规则的计划为美国大银行带来意外之财
item.description: 据摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）周四估计，美联储放宽杠杆率规定的计划可为摩根士丹利所覆盖的美国大型全球性银行释放 1,850 亿美元的资本，并释放近 6 万亿美元的资产负债表容量。【原文：A Federal Reserve plan to relax leverage rules could free up $185 billion in capital and unlock nearly $6 trillion in balance sheet capacity for large U.S. global banks covered by Morgan Stanley, the brokerage estimated on Thursday.】

item.title: 小米发布 YU7，售价 25.35 万元起，挑战特斯拉 Model Y
item.description: 中国电动汽车和智能手机制造商小米周四将其新款电动SUV YU7的售价定为比特斯拉的Model Y便宜1万元人民币（合1395美元），在全球最大的汽车市场上加大了对美国公司的挑战。【原文：Chinese EV and smartphone maker Xiaomi on Thursday priced its new electric YU7 SUV 10,000 yuan ($1,395) cheaper than Tesla's Model Y, stepping up the challenge to the U.S. firm in the world's largest auto market.】

item.title: 英国竞争监督机构考虑调查波音与精神航空的交易
item.description: 英国竞争监管机构周四表示，正在考虑波音收购其前子公司 Spirit AeroSystems 的交易是否会影响该国或其他市场的竞争。【原文：Britain's competition regulator is considering whether Boeing's deal to acquire its former subsidiary Spirit AeroSystems could affect competition in the country or in other markets, it said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 5 月商品贸易逆差扩大，出口下降
item.description: 由于出口下降，美国 5 月份的货物贸易逆差有所增加，但进口流入的减少可能会使贸易在第二季度对国内生产总值做出重大贡献。【原文：The U.S. trade deficit in goods increased in May amid a decline in exports, but an ebbing inflow of imports likely positions trade to make a big contribution to gross domestic product in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国第一季度国内生产总值因消费者支出不振而下调
item.description: 在消费者支出不振的情况下，第一季度美国经济的萎缩速度略快于此前的预期，这凸显了特朗普政府对进口商品征收激进关税所造成的扭曲。【原文：The U.S. economy contracted a bit faster than previously thought in the first quarter amid tepid consumer spending, underscoring the distortions caused by the Trump administration's aggressive tariffs on imported goods.】

item.title: 美国 5 月耐用品订单因飞机而激增
item.description: 尽管进口关税带来的经济不确定性仍制约着企业的资本支出，但受商用飞机预订量激增的推动，5 月份美国长期制成品订单大幅反弹。【原文：Orders for long-lasting U.S. manufactured goods rebounded sharply in May, boosted by a surge in commercial aircraft bookings, though economic uncertainty stemming from import tariffs remains a constraint for business spending on capital.】

item.title: 培生与谷歌联手将人工智能学习工具引入课堂
item.description: 英国教育公司培生（Pearson）周四表示，该公司已与 Alphabet 的谷歌云服务建立了多年合作关系，为学生提供人工智能学习工具，同时也让教师的工作变得更轻松。【原文：Pearson has entered a multi-year partnership with Alphabet's Google cloud service, providing students with AI learning tools that also make teachers' jobs easier, the British education company said on Thursday.】
